languages.text: "Я знаю". {n}Он спокойно кивает.{/n} "Но это не значит, что о вас не должен беспокоиться я".
"I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю". {n}Он спокойно кивает.{/n} "Но это не значит, что о вас не должен беспокоиться я".

traits.locale_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."
"I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

"I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."
"I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

languages.text: "Ich weiß, das könnt Ihr." {n}Er nickt ruhig.{/n} "Aber das heißt nicht, dass ich mir keine Sorgen um Euch machen sollte."
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, das könnt Ihr." {n}Er nickt ruhig.{/n} "Aber das heißt nicht, dass ich mir keine Sorgen um Euch machen sollte."

languages.text: « J'en ai bien conscience, {n}dit-il en hochant la tête calmement,{/n} mais ça ne m'empêche pas de m'inquiéter pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai bien conscience, {n}dit-il en hochant la tête calmement,{/n} mais ça ne m'empêche pas de m'inquiéter pour vous. »

languages.text: “我知道你能。”{n}他平静地点了点头。{/n}“但即便如此，我也有必要担心你的安危。”
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: “我知道你能。”{n}他平静地点了点头。{/n}“但即便如此，我也有必要担心你的安危。”

languages.text: «Ya sé que puede», {n}asiente con tranquilidad.{/n} «Pero eso no significa que yo no vaya a preocuparme».
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: «Ya sé que puede», {n}asiente con tranquilidad.{/n} «Pero eso no significa que yo no vaya a preocuparme».

languages.text: 「あなたならできます」{n}彼は穏やかにうなずく。{/n}「でも、だからといって、あなたのことを心配しなくていいというわけではありません」
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたならできます」{n}彼は穏やかにうなずく。{/n}「でも、だからといって、あなたのことを心配しなくていいというわけではありません」

languages.text: "Biliyorum." {n}Sakince başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ama bu, sizin adınıza endişelenmem gerektiği anlamına gelmez."
languages.original_text: "I know you can." {n}He nods calmly.{/n} "But that doesn't mean I shouldn't worry about you."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyorum." {n}Sakince başını sallar.{/n} "Ama bu, sizin adınıza endişelenmem gerektiği anlamına gelmez."
